name: Outta Mah Farm
description:
The Invaderz proundly presents , its first alpha test mobile game!

In "Outa mah Farm", you are Juca, an old crazy farmer, facing an alien strike against his farm to protect his cattle.

Armed with  you riffle and other unlockable guns, survive as many nights as you can by defeating the alien strikes, dont let they steal your cattle, and kick they outta ya farm!
